title.en: Prayer for Peace and Stability in Tibet

text.en: Unfailing sources of refuge—Buddha, Dharma and Saṅgha, and gurus, yidams and ḍākinīs,
text.en-trans: kyabné lumé könchok tsawa sum

text.en: And especially Avalokiteśvara, protector of the Land of Snows,
text.en-trans: khyepar gangchen gönpo chenrezik

text.en: Together with Noble Tārā and Guru Padmasambhava,
text.en-trans: jetsün drolma guru pema jung

text.en: We pray to you: think of us and the sacred pledges you have made!
text.en-trans: solwa deb so tukdam zhalzhé gong

text.en: Grant your blessings, so that our prayers of aspiration may be fulfilled entirely.
text.en-trans: mönlam yongsu drubpar jingyi lob

text.en: Beings of this degenerate age think and act in perverse ways,
text.en-trans: nyikdü dro nam samjor lokpa dang

text.en: And disturbances in the elements, both outer and inner,
text.en-trans: chinang jungwa trukpé gyukyen gyi

text.en: Mean that disease and pestilence, unknown in ages past, threaten human beings and animals alike.
text.en-trans: ngar madrakpa mi chuk dalyam né

text.en: Planetary forces, nāgas,gyalpo, obstructing spirits and elemental forces,
text.en-trans: za lu gyal dön nakchok jungpö zer

text.en: Cause blight, frost and hail, poor harvests, war and conflict,
text.en-trans: tsa sé ser sum lonyé maktruk tsö

text.en: Untimely rains and ominous portents for the Land of Snows,
text.en-trans: charchu minyom gangchen dra jé ten

text.en: And there is fear of earthquakes, fire, adversaries, and environmental catastrophe,
text.en-trans: sayö mé dra jung zhi jikpa dang

text.en: And especially of foreign invaders who might harm the teachings.
text.en-trans: khyepar ten la tsewé tamak sok

text.en: May all types of harm and violence in these snowy lands,
text.en-trans: gangchen jong dir nö tsé rik tadak

text.en: Be swiftly pacified and eliminated entirely.
text.en-trans: nyurdu zhi zhing tsené jom gyur chik

text.en: May precious sublime bodhicitta
text.en-trans: mi dang mimin drowa tadak gi

text.en: Arise naturally in the minds of all beings, human and non-human alike,
text.en-trans: gyü la changchub sem chok rinpoche

text.en: So that they never again think or act in harmful, violent ways.
text.en-trans: ngang gi kyé né nö tsé samjor dral

text.en: May the minds of all be filled with love for one another!
text.en-trans: pentsün jampé sem dangden né kyang

text.en: May the whole of Tibet enjoy abundant splendours, happiness and well-being!
text.en-trans: böyul ta ü dekyi pal gyi jor

text.en: And may the Buddha’s teachings flourish and endure!
text.en-trans: sangye tenpa dargyé yün né shok

text.en: Through the force of the truth embodied in the Three Roots, the Buddhas and their heirs,
text.en-trans: tsa sum gyalwa sé ché denpé tob

text.en: And through the power of all the sources of merit throughout saṃsāra and nirvāṇa,
text.en-trans: khordé gewé tsawa gang chi dang

text.en: And of our own completely pure, positive intention,
text.en-trans: dakchak lhaksam nampar karwé tü

text.en: May this, our prayer of aspiration, be fulfilled!
text.en-trans: soltab mönpé drebu drub gyur chik
